website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic option for customers seeking a lavishly comfortable harness for their pups.
pros: Simple, easy-to-use design requires little maintenance from owners
Inside sling crafted with sherpa lining, providing superior comfort for all dogs
cons: Some buyers had issues with the handles ripping after heavy use

customer_reviews.title: perfect to help my Great Dane to get up and walk with support - highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I was doubtful that this would work for my great dane whose back legs collapsed and she needs help getting up and walking as she is still very weak in the rear. This is a lifesaver and a back-saver for me. It is easy to slip under her when she is lying down and does not slip to her belly when i walk her. My girl weighs 155lbs and this is very sturdy and supports her. Thank you for great product that makes a difference in our lives!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for our 14 year old Springer.
customer_reviews.text: Our 14 year old Springer Spaniel can't move his hind legs sometime. Getting up and walking on hardwood floors is tough on him. I purchased this lift based on great reviews and we love it. He has some confidence back and has even been walk better. WARNING: We liked it so much I hit the "buy again" button and ordered two more. Unfortunately, what I received from that order were cheap Chinese knock offs. See the picture. Make sure your are purchasing this from All Seasons or you will likely get the knock offs. They may work just fine for you but I much preferred the All Seasons "Made in America" product I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Davis

customer_reviews.title: This met our aging dog's need perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Our 15 year old Shepherd has been having a difficult time going down stairs. She can't seem to negotiate the steepness, sometimes leaping off before the last step and hurting herself. We use the harness to provide support and control when we take her out. It's very easy to use, we can quickly get it under her before heading out the door. Nice simple product that does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

customer_reviews.title: This has been a huge help for my dog
customer_reviews.text: To paraphrase the song, my old black lab just ain't what she used to be. I use this to help her get up and down stairs. At first I think she didn't like it but now that she's used to it she waits for me to put it around her waist before she'll try to go up or down the stairs. If she does stumble, I'm able to keep her from falling. I just tell her "I got you" and it has given her more confidence to go downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: If your dog is having surgery, buy this one!!! Save your sanity and strength. My vet said a towel would do the trick but that method proved difficult to manage for me. I bought this one and another one morning after struggling to take my lil dude for a potty break. This one was "THE ONE"! Held up to multiple washing and is soft and comfortable on under belly. SO easy for me to manage! THANK YOU!!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help my 14 year old dog who has hip dysplasia and degenerative spine disease. It helps him to walk as he has rear end weakness. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Irma M. Holt

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: It lasted about two months and then one of the handles ripped off. Not recommended for heavy dogs. My dog weighs 100 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Great on Stairs for my 75lb dog
customer_reviews.text: My old guy has arthritis, and lately has been barely able to get on and off the sofa. As I am roughly the same size he is, lifting and carrying is not an option. This really helps. He doesn't mind it at all, and on really bad days he will wait for me to grab it before he attempts to get up from laying down. I can get him up and down stairs and on and off the bed and sofa easily.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, best option we found
customer_reviews.text: My dog had ACL surgery, and this was the only way we could lift her! The doctor wanted to sell us a very expensive sling, but a nurse recommended us just using a sheet. We tried the sheet, but it bundled up and made our girl uncomfortable. I'm not sure there is a COMFORTABLE way to lift your dog by the waist, but this was the best option we found! Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Nay

customer_reviews.title: This has been a life saver
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old, 55lb pitmix just had TPLO surgery for a torn ACL. And this has been amazing for helping get in and out of the car, walking her across our hardwood floors and vet visits. This sling is a bit long but other than that it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Torbett

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed for our 13 year old Lab
customer_reviews.text: Makes such a difference for our 13 year old lab. I put treats on it at the top of the stairs the first three nights and then as soon as she saw the harness she started up the stairs like she hasn't done in months. The harness really helps take the weight off her back legs and I just need a subtle bit of lift. This harness is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Diana W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect! Works great for helping my dog upstairs. He may not love it but he's getting used to it. The inside is very plush and it's easy to use. Great value for the price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: I

customer_reviews.title: Simple and it works.
customer_reviews.text: This sling is simple, well-priced, and works for what I wanted it for. My dog’s hind legs are partially paralyzed and I use this to support him while walking indoors. My dog is male and the sling would obstruct urination when slung under his abdomen so I use a different harness for outdoors. It is a good length and width for my 30-pound whippet and it would work fine for much bigger dogs. Someone with a smaller dog might find this sling too wide.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bob the III

customer_reviews.title: We use the lift harness on a large dog with arthritis
customer_reviews.text: We use this product for our 13 year old Golden retriever who has advanced arthritis. Many days he as trouble getting up the few steps into our house, and this product helps us gently support him as he maneuvers the steps. It appears to make him feel more confident about trying to jump up each step, as he has slipped and fallen many times without it. He is a big dog, 93 pounds, and the lift harness fits him just fine size wise.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie B. Krott

customer_reviews.title: Saved my back! You’ll want this yesterday.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to slide under her before she stood up. Was able to assist her with light support for her back legs without bending over and even one handed! My dog is 60+ lbs and had surgery on both knees. This made going out to potty and starting on physical therapy walks much easier on both of us!
customer_reviews.author: Sydz

customer_reviews.title: For Dogs that need little to moderate support
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made and sturdy. I would recommend it for dogs that have moderate arthritis, problem going up the stairs and such. However, for dogs like ours that have lost complete use of her hind legs this doesn't provide the support needed. It slips and doesn't stay in one place due to her being unable to support her rear. It was too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful

customer_reviews.title: Made very well
customer_reviews.text: This is made very well and just as described. The vet recommended that I purchase one to help my dog walk, since he is unable to support himself on his hind legs. It’s a shame my dog doesn’t like it. I’m hoping that he eventually lets me use it on him.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great price, and best of all, Made in the USA!
customer_reviews.text: Helps my 70lb older dog into the car. Easily and quickly slips around her body. Length of harness and handles are perfect for me, 5'8". Very well made, in the USA! Padding is soft, not very thick, but for the 2 seconds it is around her body, does a great job. Very affordable, too! Other sellers want 3x this amount. Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Great, & durable product for assisting large dogs.
customer_reviews.text: My 90lb. Dog just had ACL/TTA surgery so I have to take the weight off of her rear legs whenever she has to go up or down any steps. This product works very well and all I have to do is slip it under her pelvic area and hold both handles together like a suitcase. 💙🐾
customer_reviews.author: LRO MN

customer_reviews.title: Most helpful for hip displacia
customer_reviews.text: Our senior Lab has hip displacia and wobblers syndrome. She needed something that we could help her walk and get out to relive herself. This has been a blessing to her and us. It is strong and comfortable for her
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Helped Dog Recover from ACL Surgery
customer_reviews.text: This was a life-saver when my old dog was recovering from ACL surgery. She has bad hips and it took a while for her to be able to put weight on her back leg after surgery. This allowed me to walk her outside to go to the bathroom and navigate the couple of steps coming in and out of the house. The handles made it easy for me to lift and support her back end without hurting my back and arms (she's a 75 lb dog). It also gave her the support she needed to squat to potty without getting in the way.
customer_reviews.author: momzilla

customer_reviews.title: Not for small size dogs.
customer_reviews.text: The item appears to be made well but it should state that it is sized for medium size and up dogs. It does not fit correctly but under my frenchie. Simply put, just too wide to fit correctly under my dog..
customer_reviews.author: Q-ster

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my needs and budget. After using this for some time this is perfect when helping my 100lb Lab when she can't walk from room to room. For stairs l would choose something more supportive to better distribute her weight and take the strain off of me.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It was a life saver for me when my German Shepherd needed help. The handles were very sturdy. Well made, would recommend
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: We would have had to keep bent down to use it. Terrible for our backs. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: CatherineM

customer_reviews.title: Dog hates it
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as pictured, but too wide for my 33lbs dog. I'd just return it, but Amazon wants $8 in return shipping for something I could mail back for $3. Get the kind that doesn't enclose the dog's whole belly.
customer_reviews.author: Kachadurian

customer_reviews.title: Simple soft and a good length.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to grab and loop around your dog when needed and soft for the dog. However, it would be much more useful if there were a way to connect it so you could let go for a second without having it fall to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: VSK

customer_reviews.title: Great product....big help post leg surgery.
customer_reviews.text: Received my sling today in time to use when we picked up our dog after having left rear leg surgery. Works great. We had one for her last surgery 4 years ago that we loved but could not find. This one is the almost the same and just as good.. I gave the ordering info to the tech because she was very impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Soft, well made
customer_reviews.text: I have a stout little pug with short legs. As long as we are on a flat surface it works fine, however if we try to go down stairs she tips forward. This being said, the product is soft and is easy to use, but from my experience only on level ground.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Makes stair climbing so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 13 year old cattle dog and live on the second floor. He was struggling up the stairs after walking him. The lift harness gives him the stability he needs so he doesn't injure himself. I am so happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! Does the job I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: PoodleMom

customer_reviews.title: Part of an at home brushing station I'm building
customer_reviews.text: I'm still not sure what the warnings were about. This is a quality item. Super soft fur stuff, strong duffel bag straps.... it's exactly what it says it is.
customer_reviews.author: Tsilt

customer_reviews.title: So Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was so handy when my dog had surgery! I have a 90 lb large dog and this harness fit around him and held him up perfectly. It is so easy to use and really handy, and best part is it washed perfectly in the washer. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised with the great quality of the material!
customer_reviews.text: I have an elderly dog who has only one back leg and this past year she’s had the hardest time trying to walk on her own. This strap allows me to help take some of her weight off that back leg and is long enough I don’t need to bend over while I’m walking with her so I don’t put any strain on my back.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Good idea did not work with my double coated Akita
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fur liner for comfort but it ended up slipping on my dog’s fur (double coated breed) and was useless for helping me to support him getting in and out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Robin M.

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a smaller assist for my pug with stenosis. It seems to be a good fit and she doesn't seem to mind it.
customer_reviews.author: PAL MOM

customer_reviews.title: Good dog sling
customer_reviews.text: Good item to have, when your little dog is getting older and having trouble walking.
customer_reviews.author: LisaD1l

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for post surgery
customer_reviews.text: Worked great when our 60lb pitbull tore her ACL and needed surgery. The handles are big and easy to use and the fleece is fluffy and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Sherman

customer_reviews.title: This sling is easy to hold up and the lining was perfect for ...
customer_reviews.text: My labrador had hind leg surgery. This sling is easy to hold up and the lining was perfect for her under belly.
customer_reviews.author: Mel T

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. A little long when trying to hold up dog's back legs (post surgery). Still using it, does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Block

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Use this to help my 95# German Shepherd in and out of car and up & down stairs. Great product highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great aging harness for our little Schnauzer. So easy to throw in the wash, and his bad little arthritic back legs have this much needed help. Buy this. Don't waste money on a harness you need a masters degree to try and figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied pet owner
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very soft, and sturdy for your dog, really helps lift them up
customer_reviews.author: Eve Winters

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a dog who is having trouble with it's back legs
customer_reviews.author: Iris Crusan

customer_reviews.title: Great for after surgery
customer_reviews.text: Really helped for my dog after knee surgery. He is a large lab mix (98 lbs) so this helped me help him.
customer_reviews.author: Genni

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok I might have wanted to order a larger one. Don't have to use it right now.
customer_reviews.author: cindy savage

customer_reviews.title: Aid to help dogs get in an out of vehicles, etc.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet, but I bought it to help my 9 year old lab with arthritis in her back legs/hips. She had trouble getting our truck. This product is just what I envisioned in my head that would help us get her in and out without her floundering as she jumps. And it is made nice and the price was great!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Bunnell

customer_reviews.title: Not for my girl!
customer_reviews.text: Could not use. My Bella is a 90# 9y/o Pit mix with bilateral torn ACLs.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for my dog while healing from a broken back leg.
customer_reviews.author: Sena

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for lifting my 90 LB Lab into the car.
customer_reviews.author: Tamie Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to help my dog as his hind legs are weak. It works great. Nice and sturdy. Well made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MNN

customer_reviews.title: sturdy but narrow
customer_reviews.text: its sturdy and easy to use but it is narrow on her stomach
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for senior pups
customer_reviews.text: Item works well assisting an aging large dog getting up the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: worked perfect glad I had it for my fur baby
customer_reviews.author: S Hess

customer_reviews.title: Dog Lift Harness
customer_reviews.text: Very useful product for us in our mobile grooming service. Helps support all of our pets especially the senior pets that can only stand for 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Frank L

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It felt soft, but a bit itchy. My dog did not like the feel of it
customer_reviews.author: alyssa

customer_reviews.title: So simple and helpful
customer_reviews.text: Simplicity. Practical. Soft. My dog has a neurological disorder which has worsened due to age and arthritis. This simple harness helps me help him into the car, across slippery floors or up and down a couple steps.
customer_reviews.author: S Helder

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I did it before I got this. Very easy to take my 110lb dog out now
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Z

customer_reviews.title: post ACL surgery
customer_reviews.text: This worked wonderful to help me keep weight off my lab's back legs after TTA surgery for tearing his ACL. Made it much easier than trying to use a blanket
customer_reviews.author: runmommy

customer_reviews.title: It’s simple and does the job
customer_reviews.text: It’s simple. It’s easy. It’s perfect. My Australian Shepherd just had CCL surgery and needs a little extra help moving around. She uses it fine, it’s soft on her belly but the outside is made of water resistant material which is good because of the snow. Height was perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Good price, good quality, works like a charm to help the dog
customer_reviews.author: Petra

customer_reviews.title: Great lil helper for my older boy:)
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and easy to use. Hust what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Girlie

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Effective
customer_reviews.text: There are other similar products in the market and more expensive, but I think this is perfect, simple and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon costumer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, comfortable, great price.
customer_reviews.text: My 50 lb. dog hated using this, but she realized after her surgery it was a necessity and quickly adjusted her attitude. We could not get through her recovery without this product. It is a comfortable and easy to use lift. Great value, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Taylor

customer_reviews.title: All Seasons Dog Lift Harness for Post-Op Surgery
customer_reviews.text: The concept of the harness is great with the handles. However, the handles should be long and the body of the harness a little bit wider for larger dogs. Can't say I use it a lot as I am using another sling made from fleece because of the width and length.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie Renkowsky

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly !!
customer_reviews.text: Dog had ACL surgery and this product has done just what we needed it to do. been using it 3 weeks now and its alot better than trying to use a towel or sheet to carry her rear end around. Glad we bought it !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ski Coone

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and well made! Really helps get my old guy get up the steps better with his arthritis! Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Made life for my dog so much easier after having surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Johann S.

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions are incorrect
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions of this item are incorrect. The description says 42 inches and mine is 58 inches. It is way too long for me to assist my dog
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog slips right out of this. Didnt work for me.
customer_reviews.author: kellie1967

customer_reviews.title: dog lift assist, my experience with it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, l have a 95lb German Shepherd, with DM, it lifts him easily, & comfortably, easy to keep clean, just put it in the washing machine & hang to dry. By the way, very fair price.
customer_reviews.author: George Kourcklas

customer_reviews.title: Good idea
customer_reviews.text: Great concept. Our dog didn't take to it very well, but it was somewhat useful
customer_reviews.author: Eaglescout75

customer_reviews.title: Bunches up
customer_reviews.text: Seems to bunch up a lot, maybe just needs time To get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: But she does not like using it
customer_reviews.text: The harness is strong, and exactly what I expected. But she does not like using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, sturdy and easily managed
customer_reviews.text: Just got this - will be ideal for my older disabled Lab - she struggles to get up and down and walk unless it’s a level hard surface. No restrictions - perfect replacement for a towel sling!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: They lied on their ad. It said Made in America and I ordered it. Package said Made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lift Harness used after TPLO
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect and met my expectation! My dog had double TPLO surgery and this saved me! Forget trying to use a towel... Buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I had a lab who was very arthritic this allowed us to help him get much more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for older dogs
customer_reviews.text: The lift harness works great for us. Our lab-mix is 17 years old and was having trouble getting up and down stairs. The harness helps us assist him and he seems to feel safe with it. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great helper
customer_reviews.text: My dog was injured and was having trouble with his back legs. This was a great help getting him up and down steps
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful to assist my 50 lb. Dog after knee surgery
customer_reviews.author: Sallianne Harris

customer_reviews.title: Good helper
customer_reviews.text: Works great helping our dog in and out of RV using steps.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Hutchings

customer_reviews.title: Great prose
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, with a wide, soft strap so that I can help my aging labradoodle without hurting him or me!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Well made and long enough for a large dog.
customer_reviews.text: I have an old Great Dane mix and every once in a while he can't get those back legs up. This is long enough and sturdy enough for a large dog and it is soft. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this one instead of a complicated rear-leg ...
customer_reviews.text: My alpha dog's pride appears to be hurt when I try to help him up. This harness makes quick work of getting him off the floor without much struggle. Glad I bought this one instead of a complicated rear-leg harness.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use durable and comfortable and reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our German Shepard who has a torn ACL ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our German Shepard who has a torn ACL really makes all the diff. in helping her get around. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: shelley

customer_reviews.title: Easy and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to pick up the rear end of a pup who has trouble getting around.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Thin, cheaply made and to long and not strong enough to hold heavy dog !
customer_reviews.text: I gave it one star because I had to to be able to write a review . This is very thin and cheaply made! It is also to long ! The ONLY thing good about it is was made in the USA. Also if your dog is heavy like mine it is not strong enough to hold them so you have to still carry the weight of lifting your dog . Returning item!
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what every senior dog owner will need to help get them in the car
customer_reviews.author: S. Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Works great and the price is super.
customer_reviews.text: My older pug needs help going up stairs and this has been an awesome help.
customer_reviews.author: Pnichols

product_meta.title: All Seasons Dog Lift Harness for Post-Op Surgery of Weak Hind Legs (Black)
product_meta.description: Designed to help dogs with weak hind legs, difficulty standing, post-op surgery, old age or help getting around
feature_bullets: Helps to lift your dog with little discomfort
